## About Me

Hi! I'm **Jack J. Burleson** ‚Äì data scientist, research engineer, and open-source enthusiast.  
I am passionate about making data science, machine learning, and advanced analytics accessible and meaningful through clear code and insightful visualizations.  
This portfolio highlights select projects in engineering, data analysis, machine learning, and technical writing.

## Interactive Agent Swarm {#interactive-agent-swarm}

::: {.callout-tip appearance="simple"}
## ü§ñ Run the Live Interface
This portfolio contains a full **CrewAI Multi-Agent System** application.  
To interact with the specialized agent swarms (ML, Research, Business Intelligence), you can run the Streamlit interface locally.
:::

### üöÄ Quick Start

1.  **Clone this repository** to your local machine.
2.  **Install dependencies**:
    ```bash
    pip install -r requirements.txt
    ```
3.  **Launch the Swarm Interface**:
    ```bash
    streamlit run projects/Crewai/interface_web.py
    ```

[**üìÇ Browse Source Code**](https://github.com/Exios66/JJB_Gallery/tree/main/projects/Crewai) | [**üìÑ View Documentation**](projects/Crewai/README.md)

## Recent Additions

- **Random Forest Analysis:** Enhanced with interactive visualizations and decision boundary plots ([View Analysis](docs/index.html)).
